1. Introduction

PLCMonitor is an application for remote monitoring and control of various industrial processes.

This application was developed by Terencio Agozzino, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

Free of you to contribute to the application on GitHub:
(https://github.com/rememberYou/plc-monitor )

2. Connection to a PLC

The connection to a PLC required to enter three parameters:
1. IP address (e.g. 10.1.0.120)
2. Rack (e.g. 1)
3. Slot (e.g. 1)

Until now, the connection is only available for Siemens PLCs and industrial processes that are already in the default list.

3. Overview of PLC

The overview allows you to easily manage your PLCs by changing their various connection settings, logging in to them again without entering the connection credentials or simply deleting them.
Please be aware that if you delete your account, all data, privileges and PLCs associated with it will be deleted.
Please be aware that if you grant administrator rights to a user, the user can change values in various PLCs and promote other users.
Please be aware that if you delete this account, all data, privileges and PLCs associated with it will be deleted.
Please be aware that if you delete this PLC, all data associated with it will be deleted.

PLCMonitor does not share personal information of any kind with anyone. We will not sell or rent your name or personal information to any third party. We DO NOT sell, rent or provide outside access to our mailing list or any data we store. Any data that a user stores via our facilities is wholly owned by that user or business. At any time a user or business is free to take their data and leave, or to simply delete their data from our facilities.

PLCMonitor only collects such personal information that is necessary for you to access and use our services. This personal information includes first name, last name, and email address.

PLCMonitor may release personal information if PLCMonitor is required to by law, search warrant, subpoena, court order or fraud investigation. We may also use personal information in a manner that does not identify you specifically nor allow you to be contacted but does identify certain criteria about our application\'s users in general (such as we may inform third parties about the number of registered users, number of times the application has been download).
